channel.title: Can som1 help me with server
channel.description: ok i got the source and all the downloads but i need to know some things: how do i make myself g mod? how do i change the "welcome to testscape" on the main menu? how do i make more commands? when i go in "client" search for "welcome to testscape" and i change it, then i compile i look on the server and it hasn't changed! what am i doing wrong?

item.title: Can som1 help me with server
item.dc:creator: @allserversuck allserversuck
item.description:
@allserversuck wrote:

lol where do i type in my server name and choose no-ip

Read full topic
item.source: Can som1 help me with server

item.title: Can som1 help me with server
item.dc:creator: @GuNtRiX GuNtRiX
item.description:
@GuNtRiX wrote:

use no-ip.com instead
Ok once you have created an account type in your server name e.g (mescape) and click on the no-ip.biz and chose no-ip.org (thats the one I always use) then type in you ip address you can get that from here http://www.whatsmyip.org/ its at the bottom. Then click create server on the no-ip website. Now go to this http://www.download.com/No-IP-DUC-Dynamic-Update-Client-/3000-2165-10055182.html?part=dl-NoIPDUCDy&subj=dl&tag=button
download it then install it and open it and you server name should be there with a simile face next to it and make sure the box next to it is ticked and then run your server and log in!
Hope That Helps!

Read full topic

Is that email or msn?[/quote]email[br][size=1]Posted on: March 18, 2007, 06:55:47 PM[/size][hr][quote=“billy00, post:17, topic:68846”][quote author=allserversuck link=topic=100939.msg1026882#msg1026882 date=1174283399]
i dont no what would it look like if i did billy
[/quote]

Well if you had a perfect compiler and you tried to compile it will tell you if you have any errors and if you do you won’t be able to compile anything new until you fix those errors.[/quote]it doesnt say i have any errors it says javac isnt an internal or external command

item.source: Can som1 help me with server

item.title: Can som1 help me with server
item.dc:creator: @GuNtRiX GuNtRiX
item.description:
@GuNtRiX wrote:

how do i make myself g mod? character files open [CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3254
character-posy = 3429
character-rights = 2<— 0 for normal player 1 for mod 2 for admin 3 for owner
character-ismember = 1
character-messages =
character-lastconnection =
character-lastlogin =
character-energy =
character-gametime =
character-gamecount =

how do i change the “welcome to testscape” on the main menu? go into client.java and press ctl+h and whatever source you have used eg. pimpscape put that in find and your server name eg. myscape in the replace then click replace all and save
how do i make more commands? im not sure look in the tut section http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,51.0.html
Hope That Helps!

Read full topic
